title: VA / Digital Marketer / Go High Level Expert
job_overview: I run an ai coaching service for real estate agents. I need an assistant to help manage social media systems, funnel creation, automations, CRM management, and digital marketing. I need an expert that can help me dial all this into a well running machine to generate leads and convert them into clients. You will be posting content to my socials, You will help create content like infographics and blogs. You will build sales funnels in GHL and set up automations for each funnel and manage the funnels and automations for best results. You will create email and text campaigns and well as help set appointments for interested clients.
